CrossContractDependencies.WhaleDonation: Calls the donate() function on the whale contract to allocate a portion of each bet
CrossContractDependencies.ERC20Transfers: Uses an ERC20 transfer function to handle accidental ERC20 token transfers

InterContractConsistencyConditions.JackpotIntegrity: Ensures jackpot is correctly updated on each bet
InterContractConsistencyConditions.BalanceCheck: Validates that contract balance meets all locked, dev, and jackpot funds
